# llmstxt-generator

> Claude Code plugin for auto-generating, validating, and maintaining llms.txt files using local Ollama LLM models. Implements the llmstxt.org specification proposed by Jeremy Howard (Answer.AI).

## Quick Start

- [Quick Start Guide](QUICKSTART.md): 5-minute setup for Ollama and first generation
- [Full Documentation](README.md): Installation, configuration, and usage

## Commands

- [/llmstxt:generate](commands/generate.md): Interactive generation with project analysis
- [/llmstxt:validate](commands/validate.md): Format compliance, link checking, quality scoring
- [/llmstxt:edit](commands/edit.md): Text editor or interactive CLI menu editing

## Skills

- [llms-format-guide](skills/llms-format-guide.md): Comprehensive llms.txt format and best practices
- [ollama-integration](skills/ollama-integration.md): Ollama setup, models, and configuration

## Agent

- [llmstxt-analyzer](agents/llmstxt-analyzer.md): Proactive documentation analyzer

## Scripts

- [generate_llmstxt.py](scripts/generate_llmstxt.py): Python generation engine with Ollama client

## Optional

- [llms.txt Specification](https://llmstxt.org): Official format spec from Answer.AI
- [Ollama](https://ollama.ai): Local LLM runtime installation
